typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Region ID} as string,
		{Region Desc} as string,
		{Detalle region} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> extractData
extractData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		idModo as integer,
		Desc as string,
		IdTipoEnvio as integer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> store
